name: Facebook Frosted glass v3.1
description:
It is a theme with mate glass effect and blurred background, you can change background on any you want, any background will be blurred for ease of reading. _________NO ADS__________ no right chat panel! MINIMALISTIC
New bigger content!!!
To get a 18+ random changing background (20+ wallpapers, will be added once a week for 5-10 photos)  IM in facebook (here just cant publish, forbidden).
additional_info:
To change background u need just change URL in string
--wallpaper: url(YOUR URL);

To change blur level:
--blur: 15px;
To change wallpapers:
--wallpaper: url(http://webbgwall.unaux.com/randomwall.php)
